src:
Choque entre dois carros na zona de Santa Rita
Veja o vídeo
07 Nov 2019, 02:48 by Andreína Ferreira






Dois carros colidiram esta manhã na Estrada que liga Santa Rita à Cimentos Madeira. Aparentemente não houve feridos a registar, mas os Bombeiros Sapadores do Funchal estiveram no local a espalhar farelo na estrada que se encontrava com óleo.
text:
Clash between two cars in Santa Rita zone
See the video
07 Nov 2019, 02:48 by Andreína Ferreira






Two cars collided this morning on the road that connects Santa Rita to Cimentos Madeira. Apparently there were no injuries to report, but the Funchal Firefighters were at the scene spreading bran on the road that was with oil.
